## Description {#details}

An access class for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node">ilist&#95;node</a> private API.

This gives access to the private parts of ilist nodes. Nodes for an ilist should friend this class if they inherit privately from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node">ilist&#95;node</a>.

Using this class outside of the ilist implementation is unsupported.

Definition at line 228 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-h">ilist&#95;node.h</a>.
